column4: what erUSUL said.  But you may want to try inserting the word "echo" after -execdir and before prename, to see what WOULD happen if you run that.
What happened when you put    find Music/ -type f ! -name '*.mp3' -execdir echo prename 's/$/\.mp3/' {} +       ?
If nothing happened whne you put the line with the ... oh, it works. :)
